item.title: Wierdest Place you've gotten off?
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:28, topic:262431”][quote author=jme link=topic=346565.msg2681140#msg2681140 date=1235362090]

I’m the only guy here who hasn’t been laid…
[/quote]Chicks don’t dig acne.

In a taxi.

Shuld be a rapper.

  • I tried everything to get rid of my acne… Just doesn’t go.

My acne used to be slightly bad. Not severe, or disgusting like I’ve seen on some people. I tried everything from OTC meds/creams, to pro-activ (it works for jessica simpson :(), to 300 dollar bottles of prescription acne pills. None of them helped at all really. I had the same patches of acne on my cheek for most of highschool. And then, out of nowhere, it cleared up entirely in a week-span and hasn’t came back.

I personally believe that if your acne is the cause of hormones/stress/etc then nothing will work. Just keep it clean to help prevent it from getting worse. Don’t let it bother you, it adds to the stress.

acne pills?

I had some topical prescription acne cream that worked well. It was all gone until I stopped applying the cream.[/quote]
Antibiotics cus its bacterial

Read full topic

item.title: Wierdest Place you've gotten off?
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:29, topic:262431”][quote author=chrisn2323 link=topic=346565.msg2681162#msg2681162 date=1235362931]

[quote author=jme link=topic=346565.msg2681140#msg2681140 date=1235362090]

I’m the only guy here who hasn’t been laid…
[/quote]Chicks don’t dig acne.

In a taxi.

Shuld be a rapper.

  • I tried everything to get rid of my acne… Just doesn’t go.

My acne used to be slightly bad. Not severe, or disgusting like I’ve seen on some people. I tried everything from OTC meds/creams, to pro-activ (it works for jessica simpson :(), to 300 dollar bottles of prescription acne pills. None of them helped at all really. I had the same patches of acne on my cheek for most of highschool. And then, out of nowhere, it cleared up entirely in a week-span and hasn’t came back.

I personally believe that if your acne is the cause of hormones/stress/etc then nothing will work. Just keep it clean to help prevent it from getting worse. Don’t let it bother you, it adds to the stress.

acne pills?

I had some topical prescription acne cream that worked well. It was all gone until I stopped applying the cream.
[/quote]I’ve always thought it would be smart for pharmaceutical companies to make our bodies reliant on their medication. For example, we use their drugs to solve a problem, and when we stop the problem comes back even worse, so we have to buy even more. And if we try another product without that “key ingredient”, it will still get worse.

Like addicting people to drugs XD[/quote]
Well it makes sense for the acne to come back if you stop applying the cream…

Read full topic
